pageContext.claim: “I only [attack Democratic leaders] when I have to respond. I watched her on television. She said something that was false and therefore I did do that. And I will continue to do that if they're not going to play fair.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump regularly attacks anyone who disagrees with him — including Democratic leaders —with false information and nicknames regardless of whether or not they have made a false claim about his record. In particular, he often attacks former president Barack Obama, but Obama has said little publicly since leaving office in early 2017.
